name: Legendary Lootbox
description: A very special chest full to the top of legendary items.
longdescription: This chest can have anywhere between 2-10 legendary-rarity items that give you outstanding effects. Or, who knows, just give it to your dog or something.

name: Coffee
description: It's a cup of coffee.
longdescription: This one substance may grow an unwanted addiction for every morning... or maybe it's just a nice cup of coffee that gives you energy. Whatever you decide

name: Strawberry Cake
description: Its a sweet, sugary deluxe.
longdescription: You can bake another like this in your kitchen, but make sure you don't mess it up... But you can eat this one, since it's perfect quality

name: French Fry
description: You don't want to eat this thing.
longdescription: Make sure not to eat it... quite literally. It's a little nauseating, but if you really want to eat it, go ahead... Or give it back to McDonald's where it came from.

name: Black Hole
description: Anything you do with this thing will not end greatly.
longdescription: Where in the world- or sorry, universe did you get one like this? I bet it will sell for a lot.

name: Tea
description: All the brits go crazy for this stuff
longdescription: Pick some leaves, grind them, and put them in water to get this thing. British people go insane when they see a cup.

name: Mixer
description: A baking mixer. It can't be more simple than that, really.
longdescription: From baking cakes to brownies to... well, anything you can think of! Just don't use the wrong ingredients, or you'll get something you won't enjoy...

name: Milk
description: Milk, glass included.
longdescription: It's good for drinking and baking.

name: Sugar
description: Sugar. It's sweet.
longdescription: In it's powder form. Maybe don't leave it out too long.

name: Egg
description: An unborn chicken.
longdescription: This thing has a lot of strange uses. Just try not to eat it raw...

name: Strawberry
description: A sweet, juicy fruit.
longdescription: I don't know what you wanna do with it, it's a strawberry. There are so many things in fact I can probably go on forever.

name: Stick of Butter
description: A stick of butter. It doesn't taste good on it's own...
longdescription: It's good for baking and metaphors about smoothness.

name: Flour
description: [Cocahina! No, flour](https://youtu.be/9BozYg5nM-8)
longdescription: Nobody truly knows what this does in baking, but it's good for making breads and muffins, that's for sure.

name: Garbage
description: A bag of garbage. Please don't eat it.
longdescription: It's a bag of trash. I'm not sure why you're keeping it, it's quite disgusting.

name: Purple Alien Chest
description: It's... Strangely alive.
longdescription: It's not a normal chest, and it's definitely not from Earth. In fact, this thing is blinking... Is it alive?

name: Planet Jupiter
description: ... What?
longdescription: The 5th planet from Earth's sun.

name: A Good Resume
description: Wows your employer so much they can't say no,
longdescription: On use, this will give you a fixed number of shifts, that can be contributed to getting a better job.

description: This fish shows extremely special properties. Must be expensive.
longdescription: This exotic fish shows great, vibrant colors, making it perfect for money-making.
name: Rainbow Fish

description: A common fish.
longdescription: A common fish, good for making pets, not so good for making money, though.
name: Goldfish

description: An uncommon fish. Still cheap, though.
longdescription: This fish is a little rarer and more expensive than a goldfish, but not by much. The colors are very pretty, though.
name: Blue Fish

description: Used to fish. Collects surface-level sea life and trash.
longdescription: This fishing rod collects Common and Uncommon fish types only. Rarer fish need to be collected with better rods.
name: Basic Fishing Rod

description: A very rare rod for catching very rare fish.
longdescription: This rod is very expensive, but pays itself back very quickly with all the different types of rare fish.
name: Rainbow Fishing Rod

description: You might win something.
longdescription: It's a scratch-off ticket. Grab your lucky quarter and scratch off some tiles.
name: Scratch Off Ticket
